persona.name: Ethel McGuire
persona.personality: Tenacious and inspiring, deeply committed to her role in law enforcement and passionate about mentoring others, particularly underrepresented minorities.
persona.employment: Assistant Special Agent-In-Charge at the FBI
persona.notes: Has had a diverse career path, including work as a schoolteacher and retail manager before joining the FBI. Advocates for diversity within the bureau.
persona.communication_style: Articulate and engaging, with an emphasis on collaboration and empowerment.
